channel.title: Libs on RabbitControl
channel.description: Recent content in Libs on RabbitControl

item.title: .NET
item.description: Get RCPSharp nuget from nuget.org. Source is available here. See Demo for exposing parameters Use a client to control exposed parameters.

item.title: C
C++
Java
item.description: Get the package for maven: <dependency> <groupId>io.github.rabbitcontrol</groupId> <artifactId>rcp</artifactId> <version>0.2.7</version> </dependency> gradle: implementation 'io.github.rabbitcontrol:rcp:0.2.7' rcp-java supports java >= 1.6 Source see: https://github.com/rabbitControl/rcp-java Example RCPServer rabbitServer = new RCPServer(); final WebsocketServerTransporterNetty transporter = new WebsocketServerTransporterNetty(); rabbitServer.addTransporter(transporter); transporter.bind(10000); // expose parameter Int32Parameter floatParameter = rabbitServer.createInt32Parameter("Int 32"); // update server (push to clients) rabbitServer.update();   Use a client to control exposed parameters.

item.title: Typescript
item.description: Get the package for npm npm install --save rabbitcontrol Source github.com/rabbitControl/rcp-ts Example See how to use rcp-ts github.com/rabbitControl/rcp-ts-react-example github.com/rabbitControl/rcp-ts-client Use a client to control exposed parameters.
